School.name: Calm Heart Duelist

Tech.name: The Calm Heart Conquers
Tech.Description: A soul of serenity can overcome even the most stalwart opponent. You gain a bonus of +1k0 to the total of any Iaijutsu Skill Roll when you are not striking to kill your opponent, whether in a duel to first blood or a skirmish. You may make melee attacks as a Simple Action instead of a Complex Action when you are wielding a katana or wakizashi.

School.Requirements: Any Unicorn Bushi School, Rank 3 Iaijutsu: 3 Lore: Law: 1

Tech.name: The Gilded Road
Tech.Description: A true master of the caravan path can forge lasting bonds with his customers, and has reaped the rewards of his travels. You gain a bonus of +1k1 on all Commerce Skill Rolls. You also gain this bonus on all Social Skill Rolls made with your customers. You gain one level of the Wealthy Advantage and one instance of the Way of the Land Advantage for free.
